Preface

Greetings!

Thank you for Coming!

Who am I?

Hey, Reader. My name is Gaurav Gautam Shakya. I am an Engineer otherwise Electrical engineer by academics for my family and society because I pursued electrical engineering discipline at College. I found that engineering( not restricted to electricity but the true meaning of engineering) is the most fascinating career for me to explore the possibilities of life beyond the social norms and restrictions. Power of creation is the most powerful mechanism for the realisation of the purpose of life and engineering unravels that power to any Individual who devotes himself to the true meaning of the word "the Engineering" beyond societal norms and standards.

Engineering is not meant to be piece of cake because creation is the divine gift so very few people managed to make themselves eligible for this gift across the world.

What is this book about and is it worth reading?

Humans are the only species on the earth so dominated that they do not have any competition. Why is that so? How come humans became so dominated and evolved in the Animal kingdom without competition? There are many answers to this like humans are the only intelligent species on the earth, only got reasoning capabilities, humans are emotional beings, reason for domination is evolution and so on.

{" "} Many people on the earth can not comprehend the complexity of social enterprises such as family, marriage, intelligence and Emotional intelligence, Government, Legal Framework, capital punishment, system of exchange, healthcare system, learning and education, ethics and morality, human rights, and many cosmological and environmental wonders, disasters and calamities.{" "}

Of Course these are specialised domains of knowledge. one can only get specialisation in one or two domains.

so, In this book, I tried to comprehend origins and reasons for founding these complex domains of knowledge separate from others. Based on these existential reasons, I tried to comprehend the objectives and goals of these disciplines.

{" "} The scope of incomprehensibly wide. So these are just my understanding. Don't take me too seriously, have fun, and be curious about the possibilities around you.

The reason for having such scope is that the problem I Interested in has the same kind of scope. Content, Ideas and reasoning in this book augmented the solution of the problem of my interest. The problems is engineering super intelligence. Why super intelligence and what value does it add to our life or is it for the BuzzFeed of AI, general and Super Intelligence? That's great and profound question. Let me cover some basics for you to understand my point of view towards super intelligence. Before that I must confront that it is not completely because of BuzzFeed. I choose to pursue this career to engineer super intelligence because in technology, especially computer engineering and Information Technology, every subfield is overwhelmingly crowded and very narrow in scope. I was looking for a new emerging and challenging field for myself. Initially I hesitated because of buzzwords and sci-fi expectations of people which did not attract me as an engineering discipline. Accidentally, I started learning fuzzy logic and neural network as my elective subject in my final year in college.

Eventually I fell in love with the scope and emerging, complex nature. One advantage everyone gets in pioneering is that no-one knows what works and what doesn't. This is the biggest advantage for creating something very useful and revolutionary. With this thinking I immersed myself in the study to find the solution for super intelligence

I assume that you got the answer for the last question? Next comes, why and How would I accomplish this grand Vision of solving intelligence?

Answer for why is

Humans are very good at cognitive skills such as thinking, imagination, reasoning and finding solutions to complex problems or producing scientific explanations. There is a disparity between the mental world and physical world. Mental world is agile, dynamic, easily adaptable in any complex situation. On the other hand, the physical world is full of frictions. It is very complex, hard bounded with physical constraints and restrictions, Prolonged, difficult to recover and reverse engineer, less likely to adapt in most situations. These two worlds are very critical for our life to accomplish balance between both. To survive and evolve further, it is necessary to make balance both in terms of agility, adaptability and consensus among natural constraints

My mental schematic for the Super Intelligence is to make sure the mental world keeps evolving and becoming more and more advanced in cognitive abilities and simultaneously the physical world must eliminate the physical constraint and become more agile and adaptable like the mental world. If that is possible with technology and engineering that means that is the way to engineer super Intelligence.

Why did I write this book?

I did not plan to write this book in the first place. I was wondering around for the long time trying to understand the environment around me, people and social enterprise which evolved as pretty complex social organisation filled with social norms, cultural diversity and disparity, stereotypes, vulnerabilities, love, compassion, brutality, Learning, confusion, distraction, Adolescence, self-loathing, hate, regret, trauma and depression and so on and on.

Definition of these concepts and disciplines is not very much clear and understood. The responsibility is given to a specialised system of Education for defining these concepts and disciplines and teaching others so that they can make good decisions, understand people and cloud make harmony with existing society of systems and can distinguish between good life and bad life. But unfortunately, over the centuries and decades this responsibility got distracted from the founding vision for having standalone systems for training and education. Actors in the education system limit themselves to just teaching generations for their professional competencies, efficiency and effectiveness only in the legal enterprises such government, corporations and industrial workplace. Very less focus on the personal efficiency and effectiveness in social enterprises such as family, marriage, personal relationship, self development, social norms, diversity and disparity.

Learning styles, techniques and practices in the educational settings does not have correlation with the natural learning principles which promotes curiosity and constant persuasion of learning, useful creations and improvement beyond scope knowledge. There is reason to say that current educational settings do not follow the principles of natural curiosity and internal drive and hunger. If you visualise your life experience, you can easily point out that the most important and profound learning you get always comes through pain, uncertainty and discomfort. Barely you got any useful learning without pain, discomfort and uncertainty. But current institutions are trying hard to make education simple, easy and fun. These efforts might be sincere and for Goodwill but they're on the wrong track to make the education accessible to everyone but not necessarily the education and learning needed by the students.

These institutions are trying to do things.

  • 1. Education should be fun, fast and time constrained.
  • 2. Removing uncertainty by inserting hard bounded syllabus which leaves no room for uncertainty and curiosity

Both things are against natural learning.

When I spent an unjustified amount of time trying to learn something useful by offshoring learning and development discretion to these distracted institutions. Eventually I realised the kind of life I want can not be achieved by offshoring the most precious discretion for taking care of my learning and development. So I gathered some courage and started my journey for self learning and training. Responsibility of taking care of your own learning and development is huge. Requires a lot of time, patience and determination.

When I started it was nightmare for me and very hard to get single ray of sunshine what to do and where to begin. I wondered for 3 to 4 year before realising the reality and how big the the responsibility I took for myself and why people usually look for teachers and institutions. This experience is ineffable for me. That 4 years of patience made me too curious about the World around me. Consequently, I assigned myself the most difficult task, which is to organise world knowledge with logic and reasoning.

Disclaimer

I tried to be rational and not to be biassed with my own beliefs and stereotypes. But You are free to challenge these ideas. Even my advice to you is that you must challenge these ideas and try to improve your understanding. Do not take me too seriously. These are logical prototype models for the human history of problem solving. I simplified it to digest in one or two sittings and quickly reason over the current major problems such as clean water, climate change, incurable disease and their roots and importance in human history.

If you are an expert in any capacity and think my facts are not scientifically and historically right and my way of consolidation of humongous history and rationale of these ideas is not right in any capacity. Yes, you can be right but I am just Engineer, that is why I am biassed or trained myself to be biassed to abstractions, reducing complexity and time, approximating problems to make useful trade-offs

Why this book?

I am writing this book to understand the bigger circle of problems and their importance in short as well as long term. We can also have the understanding of human problems with their historical roots.

Many times I found myself hanging around the problem and facing difficulty to understand the impact and importance of solution’s of that problem which lead me to give up and move to look for new problems because previous one look less important and less impactful. But later I realised I have not developed any metal framework through which I can scrutinise the problem and their impact in the most effective and biggest context. Almost Every problem on earth has its roots in history. If we have some framework or body of Knowledge(not as exhaustive as Human History or Evolutionary sciences or social science) which can give you the bigger complete picture of Human problems and how they solve them. What kind of problems are still around us invisible or incomprehensible with today’s language, technology and our complex social organisational understanding of humans. I am writing this book to myself so that I can understand the bigger picture of problems and be able to pick one or more urgent and impactful problems to dedicate myself to solve

This book is not meant to be well scrutinised and correct facts about the history of human evolution.

Use of this book, Value extraction from this book?

One possible use case could be that this book can be used to build a logical picture of problems which have gone through in the past, are facing in the present and will continue to face or will face completely new, different problems in the future. For Building this logical picture, you can use discretion to avoid going through all human evolution.

Methodology used in this book

Methodology for this research is casual in nature. I will be traversing the whole human evolution( only event of monumental significance for humanity) by asking questions and answering the causal relationship between the events that have happened in history and their implications in the present.
